game_status_none: The Recalbox is on, but no game is currently running. (EN)
recalbox_not_found: The Recalbox could not be found. (EN)
recalbox_offline: The Recalbox seems to be offline. (EN)
screenshot_success: Screenshot taken and saved in the Recalbox screenshots folder! (EN)
screenshot_fail: The screenshot could not be taken. (EN)
no_game_on_system: Unfortunately, no games were found on the {console}. (EN)
game_not_found_on_console: The game {game} was not found on the {console}. (EN)
game_launched_error: The game {game} was found on the {console}, but the launch command failed. (EN)
game_launched_success: The game {game} was found. Launching on the {console}! (EN)
